description: This file sets up a connection to a SingleStore database, configures an agent with storage and tools, and executes sample responses. It includes environment variable configuration, certificate handling, database engine creation, and agent initialization.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with storage, tools, and handles responses.

classes.name: SingleStoreStorage
classes.description: A storage class for interfacing with SingleStore database.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: A tool for performing DuckDuckGo searches.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the agent to output responses to questions.
